Description: Magical gem; intaglio; nicolo; bevelled edge; engraved on obverse: couchant feline with hawk's bill, crocodile's tail and wearing the crown of Lower Egypt; inscribed.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (18)
Bonner 1950 / Studies in magical amulets, chiefly Graeco-Egyptian
CBd / The Campbell Bonner Magical Gems Database Online (397) (http://classics.mfab.hu/talismans/cbd/397)
